attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: Legislators continue to refine AI laws in 2026, addressing emerging challenges related to artificial intelligence and its impact on society and technology.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: The latest Veo 3.1 update enhances video editing capabilities, offering users more consistency and creative control while allowing for engaging vertical video content.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: At CES, insights on the optimism of Chinese tech companies highlight their advancements in AI, showcasing their confidence in leading future innovations.

attributes.name: summary
attributes.value: New approaches in biology treat large language models (LLMs) as alien entities, emphasizing the need for better understanding of these complex systems as they integrate into daily life.
